tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE InjuryUpdates (
  player_id INT,
  player_name VARCHAR(255),
  injury_type VARCHAR(100),
  injury_description TEXT,
  update_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Injury_Updates (
  player_id INT,
  update_date DATE,
  injury_type VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT,
  PRIMARY KEY (player_id, update_date)
)

CREATE TABLE Medical_History (
  player_id INT,
  visit_date DATE,
  diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
  treatment TEXT,
  doctor_notes TEXT,
  PRIMARY KEY (player_id, visit_date)
)

CREATE TABLE esports_players (
    player_id INT,
    player_name VARCHAR(50),
    team_name VARCHAR(50),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    nationality VARCHAR(50),
    position VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE injury_report (
    injury_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    injury_description TEXT,
    report_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_info(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE medical_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    medical_condition TEXT,
    treatment_plan TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_info(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EsportsPlayers (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(50),
    team_name VARCHAR(50),
    nationality VARCHAR(50),
    position VARCHAR(50)
);
